title: Last Christmas
lyrics:
[Chorus (2x):]
Last Christmas
I gave you my heart
But the very next day you gave it away.
This year
To save me from tears

I'll give it to someone special



thought we were all together 

atleast that's what you said I should've

known better you've broke my heart again



boy, you blow it, how could you do it, do it

ohh yeah!



[chorus 2x]

but last Christmas I gave you my heart but the

very next day you gave it away this year

to save me from tears (you got it) I gave it to

someone special



ohh, yeah



how could you leave Christmas morning

you broke my heart when I want it

boy, you blew it, how could you do it, do it



ohh, yeaaaah, ohh baaabe



last Christmas I gave you my heart (gave you my heart)

but the very next day you gave it away (gave it away)

this year to save me from tears (ohh baby)

I gave it to someone special



this is the last



(Last),Last,(Last),Last

you've broke my heart,ohh this is the

(Last), Last,(Last),Last(this year to save me from 

tears i gave it to someone special)ohhh
